    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114687</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electromagnetic radiation spectrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromagnetische Strahlung Spektrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Spectre de rayonnement électromagnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Spectrum da radiação eletromagnética</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spettro di radiazione elettromagnetica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φάσμα ηλεκτρομαγνητικής ακτινοβολίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espectro de la radiación electromágnetica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the spectrum of electromagnetic radiation in terms of the energy, frequency and wavelength of the corresponding photons.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Frequency</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">photon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">visible spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt das Spektrum der 
elektromagnetischen Strahlung in der Energie, der Frequenz und der 
Wellenlänge der entsprechenden Photonen ausgedrückt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre le spectre du rayonnement 
électromagnétique en termes d'énergie, fréquence et longueur 
d'onde des photons correspondants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra o spectrum da radiação 
eletromagnética nos termos da energia, da freqüência e do 
wavelength dos photons correspondentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra lo spettro di radiazione 
elettromagnetica in termini di energia, frequenza e lunghezza d'onda 
dei fotoni corrispondenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει το φάσμα της 
ηλεκτρομαγνητικής ακτινοβολίας από την άποψη της ενέργειας, της 
συχνότητας και του μήκους κύματος των αντίστοιχων φωτονίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra el espectro de la 
radiación electromágnetica en los términos de la energía, de la 
frecuencia y de la longitud de onda de los fotones correspondientes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
